name: Galaxia (Osuology)
description:
This is Galaxia, a generic space shooter that you shouldn't play. Yay! It just copies Galaga in many ways and is probably the shortest game you can ever experience! 

"It's just... incredibly designed, I-I-I can't comprehend the depths of it's design." -Ryan "A designer of hit NES game Dr. Jekyl and Mr. Hide" Smiggs.

"Ugh, the music just makes me feel... incredible. MOAAAAAAAAAAAN" -Some fat perverted dude on the street.

It's a steal for free! You'll wish you'd have never seen this page! WOW!
